game.name: Keplerian Space Discovery
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Travel through the solar system in your own spaceship! The motion of each celestial body is accurately reproduced by the Kepler equation.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Travel through the solar system in your own spaceship! The motion of each celestial body is accurately reproduced by the Kepler equation.
